meanings.definition: A person who is habitually grumpy or irritable.
meanings.sent1: The grouches in the neighborhood always frown and scowl.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa is one of the grouches who never seem happy.
meanings.sent3: The grouches at the party refused to dance and just sat grumbling.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds in the sky seemed like grouches ready to rain on our parade.
meanings.sent5: The image of the grouch in the movie was so vivid, it stayed in my mind for days.

meanings.sent1: She grouches about the weather every morning.
meanings.sent2: The students grouch when they have too much homework.
meanings.sent3: The cat grouchily meowed at the closed door, wanting to go outside.
meanings.sent4: The engine grouchily sputtered before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: His constant grousing made everyone avoid him at work.
